programme.title: ONE Fight Night 39- Rambolek vs. Dayakaev 2026
programme.desc: ONE Fight Night 39 launches ONE’s 2026 U.S. primetime slate at Bangkok’s Lumpinee Stadium on Fri 23 Jan. Thailand’s Rambolek Chor Ajalaboon faces Russian KO artist Abdulla “Smash Boy” Dayakaev in a pivotal bantamweight Muay Thai bout linked to Nabil Anane’s world-title picture. Plus, 18-year-old Helena Crevar debuts vs Teshya Noelani Alo in submission grappling.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

programme.title: West Ham United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: West Ham have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League home games against Sunderland, going down 3-0 in May 2011. They’ve won their last three all by the same 1-0 scoreline. Sunderland are looking to complete the Premier League double over West Ham for just the second time, previously doing so in 2010-11 when the Hammers were relegated.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23

programme.title: Manchester City vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Burnley have lost six of their last seven Premier League games against Tottenham, including each of the last four in a row since a 1-0 home win in February 2022. Tottenham average 2.2 goals-per-game in the Premier League against Burnley, only averaging more against Hull among sides they’ve faced 10+ times.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Burnley have lost six of their last seven Premier League games against Tottenham, including each of the last four in a row since a 1-0 home win in February 2022. Tottenham average 2.2 goals-per-game in the Premier League against Burnley, only averaging more against Hull among sides they’ve faced 10+ times.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Bournemouth have conceded 52 goals in their 17 Premier League games against Liverpool – against no side have they shipped more. Liverpool have won 12 of their last 13 Premier League games against Bournemouth, with the exception being a 1-0 away defeat in March 2023.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Bournemouth have conceded 52 goals in their 17 Premier League games against Liverpool – against no side have they shipped more. Liverpool have won 12 of their last 13 Premier League games against Bournemouth, with the exception being a 1-0 away defeat in March 2023.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21
programme.desc: Villarreal have lost four of their last five LaLiga matches against Real Madrid, one more defeat than in their previous 12 matches against them in the competition, losing the last three – only twice before have they lost four or more in a row against them in the top-flight: six in 2002 and five in 2011. Real Madrid have earned points in 21 of their 25 visits to Villarreal in LaLiga – Villarreal have not picked up more home draws against any other opponent in their history in the competition than against the White team.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: Slavia Praha vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

programme.title: West Ham United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: West Ham have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League home games against Sunderland, going down 3-0 in May 2011. They’ve won their last three all by the same 1-0 scoreline. Sunderland are looking to complete the Premier League double over West Ham for just the second time, previously doing so in 2010-11 when the Hammers were relegated.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Burnley have lost six of their last seven Premier League games against Tottenham, including each of the last four in a row since a 1-0 home win in February 2022. programme.desc: Brentford lost this exact fixture 2-0 last season but have never lost consecutive home league matches against Nottingham Forest. Nottingham Forest are looking to complete the league double over Brentford for the third time, previously doing so in 2006-07 and 2019-20.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Brentford lost this exact fixture 2-0 last season but have never lost consecutive home league matches against Nottingham Forest. Nottingham Forest are looking to complete the league double over Brentford for the third time, previously doing so in 2006-07 and 2019-20.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Arsenal have won each of their last four Premier League home games against Manchester United, the longest home winning run against them by any side in the competition. The last team to win five in a row in the league were West Brom between 1976 and 1980. Manchester United are winless in their last six Premier League games against Arsenal – they’ve never gone seven in a row without a win against the Gunners in their league history.

programme.title: Hull City vs Swansea - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Hull City have won just one of their last seven league games against Swansea City, triumphing 2-1 in December 2024. Swansea City have lost nine of their last 14 away league games against Hull City, a run which has seen the Swans net multiple goals in just two of those matches.

programme.title: EPL Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each EPL Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille have lost their last three UEFA Champions League games against Liverpool, most recently in the 2008-09 group stage. Liverpool have won just one of their last six away games against French sides in all competitions, though it was a 1-0 win at PSG in their most recent visit in March 2025.

programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: 10, A Magic Number
programme.desc: Pele, Maradona, Platini, Zidane…Messi were great number 10. Today this magical number “10” doesn’t mean a lot in the modern football. Why Football is missing these key players today ? Why modern football doesn’t count on them anymore ?

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

programme.title: Slavia Praha vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is just the third meeting between Slavia Prague and Barcelona, with the Spanish side winning 2-1 away before a 0-0 draw at home in the 2019-20 UEFA Champions League group stage. Slavia Prague have won just one of their 14 meetings with Spanish sides in major European competition, beating Sevilla 4-3 at home in the 2018-19 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.desc: Young players have to score the most beautiful goal in front of Koffi Kouao at the FC Metz training center. programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: West Ham have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League home games against Sunderland, going down 3-0 in May 2011. They’ve won their last three all by the same 1-0 scoreline. Sunderland are looking to complete the Premier League double over West Ham for just the second time, previously doing so in 2010-11 when the Hammers were relegated.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Burnley have lost six of their last seven Premier League games against Tottenham, including each of the last four in a row since a 1-0 home win in February 2022. Tottenham average 2.2 goals-per-game in the Premier League against Burnley, only averaging more against Hull among sides they’ve faced 10+ times.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Bournemouth have conceded 52 goals in their 17 Premier League games against Liverpool – against no side have they shipped more. Liverpool have won 12 of their last 13 Premier League games against Bournemouth, with the exception being a 1-0 away defeat in March 2023.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21
programme.desc: Villarreal have lost four of their last five LaLiga matches against Real Madrid, one more defeat than in their previous 12 matches against them in the competition, losing the last three – only twice before have they lost four or more in a row against them in the top-flight: six in 2002 and five in 2011. Real Madrid have earned points in 21 of their 25 visits to Villarreal in LaLiga – Villarreal have not picked up more home draws against any other opponent in their history in the competition than against the White team.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Arsenal have won each of their last four Premier League home games against Manchester United, the longest home winning run against them by any side in the competition. programme.title: Newcastle United vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Brentford lost this exact fixture 2-0 last season but have never lost consecutive home league matches against Nottingham Forest. Nottingham Forest are looking to complete the league double over Brentford for the third time, previously doing so in 2006-07 and 2019-20.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Brentford lost this exact fixture 2-0 last season but have never lost consecutive home league matches against Nottingham Forest. Nottingham Forest are looking to complete the league double over Brentford for the third time, previously doing so in 2006-07 and 2019-20.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Arsenal have won each of their last four Premier League home games against Manchester United, the longest home winning run against them by any side in the competition. The last team to win five in a row in the league were West Brom between 1976 and 1980. Manchester United are winless in their last six Premier League games against Arsenal – they’ve never gone seven in a row without a win against the Gunners in their league history.

programme.title: EPL Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each EPL Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Marseille have lost their last three UEFA Champions League games against Liverpool, most recently in the 2008-09 group stage. Liverpool have won just one of their last six away games against French sides in all competitions, though it was a 1-0 win at PSG in their most recent visit in March 2025.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2025/2026
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal ‘out and about’ interviews with the Premier League’s biggest stars, providing players with a platform to tell their story in their own words.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026
programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: Best World Cup Player 2018
programme.desc: WHO WERE THE BEST WORLD CUP PLAYERS IN 2022

programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: 10, A Magic Number
programme.desc: Pele, Maradona, Platini, Zidane…Messi were great number 10. Today this magical number “10” doesn’t mean a lot in the modern football. Why Football is missing these key players today ? Why modern football doesn’t count on them anymore ?

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

programme.title: Slavia Praha vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is just the third meeting between Slavia Prague and Barcelona, with the Spanish side winning 2-1 away before a 0-0 draw at home in the 2019-20 UEFA Champions League group stage. Slavia Prague have won just one of their 14 meetings with Spanish sides in major European competition, beating Sevilla 4-3 at home in the 2018-19 UEFA Europa League.

Liverpool have won just one of their last six away games against French sides in all competitions, though it was a 1-0 win at PSG in their most recent visit in March 2025.

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: MA Super Ligue 1
programme.desc: Young players have to score the most beautiful goal in front of Koffi Kouao at the FC Metz training center. The locker room interview will feature 13-year-old Fanny, who will ask questions of her choice to the famous Paris FC goalkeeper, Kevin Trapp. This week's VIP pass has been reserved for not one, but two die-hard fans of HAC player Yassine Kechta.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: West Ham have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League home games against Sunderland, going down 3-0 in May 2011. They’ve won their last three all by the same 1-0 scoreline. Sunderland are looking to complete the Premier League double over West Ham for just the second time, previously doing so in 2010-11 when the Hammers were relegated.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Burnley have lost six of their last seven Premier League games against Tottenham, including each of the last four in a row since a 1-0 home win in February 2022. Tottenham average 2.2 goals-per-game in the Premier League against Burnley, only averaging more against Hull among sides they’ve faced 10+ times.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Bournemouth have conceded 52 goals in their 17 Premier League games against Liverpool – against no side have they shipped more. Liverpool have won 12 of their last 13 Premier League games against Bournemouth, with the exception being a 1-0 away defeat in March 2023.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21
programme.desc: Villarreal have lost four of their last five LaLiga matches against Real Madrid, one more defeat than in their previous 12 matches against them in the competition, losing the last three – only twice before have they lost four or more in a row against them in the top-flight: six in 2002 and five in 2011. Real Madrid have earned points in 21 of their 25 visits to Villarreal in LaLiga – Villarreal have not picked up more home draws against any other opponent in their history in the competition than against the White team.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Arsenal have won each of their last four Premier League home games against Manchester United, the longest home winning run against them by any side in the competition. programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 23
programme.desc: Arsenal have won each of their last four Premier League home games against Manchester United, the longest home winning run against them by any side in the competition. programme.title: Derby County vs West Brom - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026

programme.title: Copenhagen vs Napoli - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Copenhagen will face Napoli for the first time in this match, while it will be the first UEFA Champions League fixture between sides from Denmark and Italy since the 2020-21 campaign, where Atalanta went unbeaten home and away versus FC Midtjylland. Napoli have won all four of their previous games against Danish opposition in European competition, beating B 1909 Odense twice in the 1966-67 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup and FC Midtjylland twice in the 2015-16 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M
programme.desc: This will be the first-ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Melbourne City and Sanfrecce Hiroshima; City are winless in each of their two games against Japanese opposition in the competition, while a win for Sanfrecce would see them beat Australian opponents in three consecutive games for the first time in competition history. Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: Feyenoord vs Sturm Graz - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7
programme.desc: Feyenoord met Sturm Graz in the UEFA Europa League in the 2022-23 group stage – they won 6-0 at home, before losing 1-0 in Austria. Sturm Graz have never won an away European match in the Netherlands in six attempts, losing their last four in a row.

programme.title: Ferencvaros vs Panathinaikos - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7
programme.desc: Ferencváros and Panathinaikos last met in the 1965-66 European Cup, with the Hungarian side unbeaten in both games. Panathinaikos last met a Hungarian side in the 1986-87 UEFA Cup when they played Budapest Honvéd at the last 16 stage – they lost 5-2 away in the first leg but won 5-1 at home in the second leg to progress.

programme.title: Ferencvaros vs Panathinaikos - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7

programme.title: Olympiacos vs Bayer 04 Leverkusen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Olympiakos and Bayer Leverkusen faced twice in the UEFA Champions League 2002-03 first group stage – the Greek side won 6-2 at home before a 2-0 win for Leverkusen at the BayArena. Bayer Leverkusen are winless in their last three away major European trips to Greece since beating Panathinaikos 4-1 in the Cup Winners’ Cup in October 1993.

programme.title: Bayern München vs Union Saint-Gilloise - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: This is the first ever competitive meeting between Bayern Munich and Union Saint-Gilloise. Bayern have won eight of their nine home games against Belgian sides in all competitions, including a 4-0 win against Club Brugge already this season. Union Saint-Gilloise are unbeaten in all four of their away games against German sides in major European competition, most recently a 2-1 win at Eintracht Frankfurt in the 2023-24 UEFA Conference League.

programme.title: Millwall vs Charlton Athletic - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Millwall are unbeaten across their last 13 league games against Charlton Athletic, since a 2-0 defeat in March 1996. programme.title: Marseille vs Lens - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 19
programme.desc: Marseille have lost seven of their 11 Ligue 1 matches against Lens since 'Sang et Or' were promoted in 2020-21, only losing more top-flight games against Paris SG over the same period. Meanwhile, Lens have won more games against Marseille than against any other opponent since their return to Ligue 1. Marseille have failed to score in three of their five home Ligue 1 games against Lens since the visitors’ last promotion in 2020-21 – as many times as they did in their previous 46 such encounters.

programme.title: Aix vs PSG - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Sailiya vs Qatar Club - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W13
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Guingamp vs Troyes - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Atletico Madrid vs Mallorca - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid are unbeaten in their last six LaLiga games against Mallorca, their second-best unbeaten streak against them in the competition's history, after a run of nine matches between January 2000 and December 2005. Mallorca have lost their last three away games against Atlético de Madrid in LaLiga, failing to score in the last two of them. They have never gone three consecutive away games without scoring against Atlético de Madrid in the competition's history.

programme.title: Eibar vs Almeria - LaLiga Hypermotion 2025-2026 - Spanish La liga 2
programme.desc: La Liga 2 is the men's second professional association football division of the Spanish football league system. It is contested by 22 teams, with the top two teams plus the winner of a play-off promoted to La Liga and replaced by the three lowest-placed teams in that division.
